titleStmt.title: The Spaniards perpetuall designes to an vniuersall monarchie. Translated according to the French
Dessein perpetuel des Espagnols a la monarchie universelle. English.
titleStmt.author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.
Baudartius, Willem, 1565-1640. Progrez des conquestes du roy d'Espagne.
Hotman, Jean, seigneur de Villers-Saint-Paul, 1552-1636, attributed name.
Joseph, père, 1577-1638, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A translation by Thomas Scott of "Dessein perpetuel des Espagnols a la monarchie universelle", sometimes attributed to Jean Hotman and to père Joseph. This may be an enlarged version of: Baudart, Willem. Progrez des conquestes du roy d'Espagne.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: *-2*⁴.
Running title reads: The Spaniards perpetuall designe, to an vniversall monarchie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
